thig5.7:1.2_0: I heard the teaching from a mendicant.
thig5.7:2.1_0: Leaving behind my son and my daughter,
thig5.7:2.3_0: I had my hair cut off,
thig5.7:2.4_0: and then I went forth to homelessness.
thig5.7:3.3_0: I gave up greed and hate,
thig5.7:4.1_0: When I was fully ordained as a nun,
thig5.7:5.1_0: Conditions are born of causes, crumbling;
thig5.7:5.4_0: I have become cooled and quenched.
